navigating_state.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "unicorn/state.h"
2 
3 /* State description:
4  The navigating state is instansiated when a move command has been issued.
5  1. Send Goal to move_base
6  2. Await goal completion status
7  2 alt. if abort signal is issued, cancel goal.
8  4. Exit State with next state set to ALIGNING
9  4. Exit State with next state set to IDLE if goal was canceled.
10 */
11 
12 typedef actionlib::SimpleActionClient<move_base_msgs::MoveBaseAction> MoveBaseClient;
